snippet: SIEGEL--Jerome. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Jerry Siegel, beloved husband of the late Ruth Siegel. Jerry leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Jerry's children, Henry and Talia Siegel, Elizabeth Carpenter, Carol Siegel, Michael Levin and Laurence de Segonzac-Levin, Stephen and Amy Levin, Robin Levin, and William and Sharon Levin; his grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: SIEGEL--Jerome. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Jerry Siegel, beloved husband of the late Ruth Siegel. Jerry leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Jerry's children, Henry and Talia Siegel, Elizabeth Carpenter, Carol Siegel, Michael Levin and Laurence de Segonzac-Levin, Stephen and Amy Levin, Robin Levin, and William and Sharon Levin; his grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
